summary: The life of Bettie Page, a 1950s pin-up model and one of the first sex icons in America, who became the target of a Senate investigation because of her risqué bondage photos.
cast: Gretchen Mol|Chris Bauer|Jared Harris|Sarah Paulson|Cara Seymour|David Strathairn|Lili Taylor|John Cullum|Matt McGrath|Austin Pendleton|Norman Reedus|Dallas Roberts|Victor Slezak|Tara Subkoff|Kevin Carroll|Ann Dowd|Michael Gaston|Jefferson Mays|Peter McRobbie|Dan Snook|Jonathan M. Brandon Johnson|Anna Kendrick|John Manzelli|Denis McKeown|Bettie Page|Sam Reich|EJ Scalzi|John Ventimiglia
title: Bettie Page: la chica de las revistas
